tag_list: natasha-weston, seo-company, seo-company-bristol, marketing, search-marketing, search-engine-optimisation, web-design, web-design-bristol
overview:
Natasha Weston is the Managing Director of a fast growing Search Engine Optimisation and Web Design business based in Bristol, UK called SEO Company Bristol Ltd

She has a great outlook on life and has an honest, upfront and caring nature.

Natasha Weston works very hard and is good at what she does, she is also a mother to 4 girls so leads an energetic lifestyle.

She also have overcome bowel cancer in the past 18 months and is on her way to 5 years cancer clear, this has of course had a big impact on her life and her family and having lots of fun and doing things she may never have tried before are certainly on the agenda and life is never taken too seriously!

Natasha has 15 years of back-to-back sales and marketing experience and utilises these skills very well in her internet search marketing optimisation techniques with success.

Natasha Weston aims to grow a large company that charges prices which are affordable and gives quality work and an honest service, something which is priority to remain no matter how large the business gets!
